page.title: 11SHOPPING CENTRES
page.content: Over the past five years Mossend Shopping centre has been redeveloped.Although this redevelopment has taken place the customers do not seem to be spending their money there and so the Council has made no further plans to develop this site. In Bellshill Town Centre a number of indoor markets have been set up.They have proved to be very popular and successful with the shoppers. Part of their attraction seems to be that a varied shopping programme can be carried out sheltered from the inclement weather.
